ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 1: Can't Go Home Again
ComicInfo.Series: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency: The Salmon of Doubt
ComicInfo.Summary:
Dirk Gently, created by Douglas Adams and shortly to be the star of his own television series from BBC America, returns to comics in The Salmon of Doubt, brought to you by executive producers of the show Arvind Ethan David and Max Landis.
Plagued by nightmares about a childhood he never had, Dirk returns to Cambridge University to seek the advice of his former tutor, the time-traveling Professor Reg Chronotis. There he discovers that a holistic detective can have more than one past, and his adventures have only just begun... Featuring fan-favorite characters from the original books as well as the cast from the TV series, including Elijah Wood.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Ilias Kyriazis | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Photo | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Robert Hack & Stephen Downer | 3 | RE | NYCC Metallic Ink Convention Exclusive Variant Cover | Ilias Kyriazis | 4 | Note: Some online and offline retailers received this issue early (10/12/2016).
